title: Why a Frenchman built a 'Tudor' castle in Burkina Faso

description: The 1980s are once again influencing some of the world’s biggest artists like Dua Lipa and The Weeknd.

description: Musicians in South Korea have played a classical music concert for coronavirus patients.

title: Coronavirus: 13-year-old boy dies, says London hospital trust
description: Ismail Mohamed Abdulwahab is thought to be the youngest person to have died with the virus in the UK.

description: A woman surprised her fiancé for his birthday by organising a mass sing-along in their apartment building.

title: Match of the Day to return with classic highlights

description: Newsreader George Alagiah says he caught the virus between cancer treatments and had mild symptoms.

description: Scientists have been amazed at the public's response to help digitise the UK's old rainfall records.

description: Premier League and EFL clubs are set to discuss a collective wage deferral agreement at a meeting with the PFA on Wednesday.

description: Lenders are cutting back on loans, unless borrowers have a huge deposit or plenty of equity.
